IN_STORE_RETURN.locations: Any Datart store in the Czech Republic
IN_STORE_RETURN.conditions: Goods must be undamaged, complete, in original packaging, with all accessories and proof of purchase. Applies only to e-shop purchases.

HOME_COLLECTION.cost: Free for large appliances (via PPL/DPD). For standard returns, at customer's own expense.
HOME_COLLECTION.conditions: Goods must be undamaged, complete, in original packaging, with all accessories. Include a copy of the proof of purchase and a completed withdrawal form. Send to: DATART.cz, s.r.o., Reklamační oddělení, Všechromy 1000, 251 63 Strančice. Applies only to e-shop purchases.

FREE_RETURN.conditions: Within 14 days for e-shop purchases. Goods must be undamaged, complete, in original packaging, with all accessories and proof of purchase. Excludes perishable goods, consumables, hygienic goods, software, audiobooks, and customized items.
FREE_RETURN.methods: In-store return, Zásilkovna (parcel shops and lockers). Free home collection only for large appliances.

QR_CODE_BARCODE_PIN.usage: Generate a return code online (via My Account or app) and use it at Zásilkovna drop-off points or Z-BOXes. No label printing required.

EXTERNAL_RETURN_PORTAL.features: Generating return codes for Zásilkovna returns.

SUMMARY: Detailed return policy information is not available on this page. A link to 'Vrácení zboží a reklamace' (Return of goods and complaints) is present, but its content is not provided in the DOM.
